page.title: 15Home Life
page.content: About half the homes in this section are farms or have farming connections and therefore life centres around this industry. Farmers'wives are well known for their skills in poultry dressing, cake and jam making, and flower arranging and wine making. Many of the women still help with the outside work and have more time for this as possession of electrical appliances makes housework easier and less time consuming. The other half of the community also takes an interest in outdoor pursuits and most gardens are well stocked with flowers and vegetables - some of the produce being sold at the WI market in Bromyard. Most of the community enjoy watching television, younger ones also enjoy videos, pop music, and discos, when their homework is finished.
